title: Extended by Popular Demand: All-Inclusive Maldives Oceanfront Villas with Free-Flow Drinks & Return Domestic Flight Transfers
description:
Discover a world of shimmering lagoons, lush jungle and all-inclusive island bliss with this oceanfront villa stay, perfectly positioned in the heart of the spectacular Addu Atoll. Surrounded by Addu’s rich heritage, culture and abundance of natural wonders, there’s no better place to soak up the Maldives’ iconic surfside serenity. 

Laze by the resort’s magnificent central pool, plunge into some of the archipelago’s most awe-inspiring dive spots or witness migrating waterbirds and wartime history on Hulhumeedhoo Island. Catch DJ-spun tracks and each soul-soaring sunset poolside at Dhoni Bar or head to Kilhi Restaurant for a lavish spread of French-inspired and Maldivian culinary delights. 

With an abundance of activities and experiences available - including dolphin cruises, snorkelling, nature walks and an onsite authorised SSI Dive Centre - there’s no better place to find magic in the Maldives.
offer_address: Herathera, Addu City, Seenu Atoll 19060, Maldives

title: Maldives Oceanfront Villas with All-Inclusive Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner & Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks

Catch DJ-spun tracks and each soul-soaring sunset poolside at Dhoni Bar or head to Kilhi for a lavish spread of French-inspired and Maldivian culinary delights. With an abundance of activities and experiences available - including dolphin cruises, snorkelling, nature walks and an onsite authorised SSI Dive Centre - there’s no better place to find magic in the Maldives.
